info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:01PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 445 PM MST... At 401 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Hilltop, or 19 miles northeast of Globe, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Hilltop, Claypool, Inspiration and Roosevelt Estates. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 243 and 284. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 256. AZ Route 77 near mile marker 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
